descriptionHtml:
Takes Hunterborn's Living Take Time patch, which included support for the original Frostfall, and updates the scripts for the new Campfire/Frostfall3 release by Chesko.  No longer supports the original frostfall (will be added back later)

I'm working on a complete Living Takes Time framework to make it easier to add support for new mods without having to keep replacing the core scripts.  The intention is that a new mod can provide an additional pex file (maybe with esp) and it will handle the activities that take time in that mod.

Features (Campfire/Frostfall only)
[list]
[*]All crafting items moved from chesko_frostfall.esp to campfire.esm
[*]Firecraft abilities take reasonable amounts of time
[*]Firecraft perk optionally improves firecraft times
[*]Crafting snowberry extract handled for frostfall.esp if it exists
[*]None of the original capabilities, nor those of the other included mod timings, have been modified

[/list]
Known Issues:
[list]
[*]FISS saving of settings were not updated for Hunterborn, and still have not been updated.  Will be fixed by 1.0 release.
[*]I have no idea if this will work on a dirty save, probably will be buggy with leftover unreferenced variables.  You probably should disable Living Takes Time, save, quit, start, enable and check settings in MCM.

[/list]
Installation Instructions:[list=1]
[*]Locate your ...\Skyrim\Data\Scripts folder
[*]Open the archive
[*]Copy three RTT*.pex files into your ...\Skyrim\Data\Scripts folder

[/list]
author: mlheur
